Package com.radirius.mercury.utilities

Interface Summary
Component An abstraction for components, objects which are initialized, updated, rendered and cleaned up.
Wipeable An abstraction for objects that can 'wipe' themselves, or self destruct.
 

Class Summary
ArrayUtils A utilities class for arrays.
DopplerReader A utility class for reading tile maps from Doppler Indie Games.
TaskTiming An easy to use utility for one-shot, and reccuring timertasks.
TaskTiming.Task  
WipingArrayList<T extends Wipeable> An arraylist that you can wipe Wipeables with.
